name: KEM--2018 The 8th International Conference on Advanced Materials Research (ICAMR 2018)--Ei, Scopus
content: 2018 The 8th International Conference on Advanced Materials Research (ICAMR 2018) will be held in Fukuoka, Japan, during 【January 20-22, 2018】. Conference official website: http://www.icamr.org + The submitted full papers will be peer-reviewed, accepted and registered full papers will be published by Key Engineering Materials, which will be included in the major data base, Ei, Scopus, etc. →Keynote& Invited Speaker: Prof. Serge Zhuiykov, Ghent University Global Campus, South Korea; Dr.Senai YAL?INKAYA, Marmara University, G?ztepe Campus, Kad?koy-ISTANBUL-TURKEY; Prof. Yusuf SAHIN, Gazi University, Turkey →Contact: Ms. Celine. Xi/ icamr@sciei.org +1-562-606-1057
